entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 23. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
